title: ETA on the Hextech Crafting?
body: It's just that North America got it around a week ago, and I've seen no sign of it yet for OCE. If anyone has some insight on it, I'd appreciate it

replies.body:
I think we're all getting a little impatient, and jealous of our NA friends ;)

Here's what we know:

+ On March 16, when asked about the release time, **Riot Mirross** said:

 _"Most Riot regions should be next week (except Korea)."_

 Full quote and more can be found [here](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/03/red-post-collection-april-sales.html#2).

Since that was said on the 16th,  the _"next week"_ he's referring to would be the current week. So essentially, it's coming very very soon, assuming there are no delays.

Yeah, It's just that I couldn't find anything about the other regions, that's why I just wanted some info on it

Thanks!

Should be Thursday im guessing~ and so is the new champ...
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
